title: Head of Operations Job at Prosperity Microfinance Bank Nigeria Limited
content:
Prosperity Microfinance Bank Nigeria Limited (PMBank) is a Microfinance Bank incorporated in Nigeria with the Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria in March 2005 under the provisions of the Companies and Allied Matters Act CAP C20 LFN 2004 with registration number RC 620230 and commenced operations on 10th October 2005. It is licensed to carry on the business of microfinance banking by the Central Bank of Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Operations
Job Location: Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Operational Leadership:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement strategies to optimize operational efficiency and service delivery.
	Oversee the bank’s operational processes, including account management, loan disbursement, and transaction processing.
	Ensure the alignment of operational activities with the bank’s strategic goals.


Process Improvement:


	Design and implement policies and procedures to improve operational workflows and reduce turnaround time.
	Identify opportunities for automation and digitization to enhance operational efficiency.
	Conduct regular reviews of operational systems to ensure they are up-to-date and effective.


Risk and Compliance Management:


	Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies, particularly those set by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).
	Monitor and mitigate operational risks through the implementation of robust control frameworks.
	Oversee the management of internal and external audits related to operations.


Team Leadership:


	Manage and develop the operations team, providing training, mentorship, and performance feedback.
	Foster a culture of accountability, excellence, and continuous improvement within the department.
	Set and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) for the operations team.


Customer Service Excellence:


	Develop and implement strategies to improve customer experience and satisfaction.
	Monitor service delivery channels to ensure a seamless and positive customer experience.
	Handle escalated customer service issues and resolve them efficiently.


Resource and Asset Management:


	Oversee the management of the bank’s physical and technological assets to ensure optimal performance.
	Ensure efficient allocation and utilization of resources to support operational goals.
	Manage vendor relationships and ensure cost-effective procurement of services and supplies.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of OND with 5 - 15 years of experience. 


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: nhrecruiters@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Customer Support Officer Job at Ivorypay
content:
Ivorypay is a crypto payment gateway that enables businesses in Africa to get paid in stable cryptocurrency and leverage Defi and NFT for growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This role is ideal for someone with strong communication skills, technical curiosity, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences.
	You’ll handle real-time interactions, resolve user issues, support operational improvements, and work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure customer satisfaction at every touchpoint.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide prompt, professional support to users via email, live chat, phone, and social media.
	Troubleshoot wallet issues, payment delays, or account-related concerns.
	Escalate product or technical issues to the appropriate teams, ensuring fast resolution.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and case resolutions using CRM tools.
	Identify recurring issues and contribute to the improvement of support workflows and self-help content.
	Stay updated on product changes and proactively share insights with customers.
	Act as an escalation point for sensitive user concerns, offering strategic guidance and resolution.
	Collaborate with internal teams to enhance FAQs, help centre articles, and internal support materials.


Requirements


	Minimum of 2 years of customer support experience, preferably in the Fintech space.
	Prior experience using CRM tools.
	Excellent written and verbal communication in English.
	Customer-first mindset with strong problem-solving skills.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced, startup environment.
	Familiarity with blockchain concepts and digital wallets is an added advantage.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and strong attention to detail.
	Must be based in Lagos, Nigeria.
	Comfortable working in a hybrid setup (remote and onsite).
	Willingness to work shifts, weekends, or public holidays, when necessary.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@ivorypay.io using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: SME Leasing Officer Job at Addosser Finance Limited
content:
Addosser Finance Limited is a fast growing Finance Company licensed by Central Bank of Nigeria on the foundation of integrity, best practices and excellence to deliver innovative and bespoke financial solutions to SMEs and individuals. We are a reliable financial partner that provides a plethora of easily accessible financial solutions such as Loans, Leases, Corporate Financing and Advisory Services to bridge the funding gap for individuals, business owners and corporate institutions. We also offer investment solutions tailored to help our client’s grow their wealth and meet their financial goals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: SME Leasing Officer
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a results-driven and detail-oriented SME Leasing Officer to support and grow our SME leasing portfolio. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in lease structuring, client relationship management, and credit analysis within a financial institution.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and engage prospective SME clients for leasing products.
	Evaluate lease applications by conducting credit and risk assessments.
	Structure lease facilities in line with company policies and risk appetite.
	Monitor lease accounts to ensure timely payments and compliance.
	Prepare and present lease proposals for management approval.
	Maintain strong relationships with existing clients to drive renewals and referrals.
	Collaborate with credit, risk, and legal teams to ensure seamless documentation and disbursement.
	Generate periodic reports on lease portfolio performance.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a minimum of a First Degree in any discipline (Finance, Business Admin, or related field preferred).
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in SME leasing within a financial institution.
	Good understanding of leasing operations, credit analysis, and risk management.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ayodeji.omidiji@addosser.com using “Leasing Officer – Lagos” as the subject of the email.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Sensei Integrated Global Farms
content:
Sensei Integrated Global Farms is a forward-thinking agricultural enterprise driven by excellence, innovation, and mastery. We specialise in integrated farming practices that combine fish farming, vegetable cultivation, and sustainable agri-solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Niger
Employment Type: Part-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	SIG Farms is a dynamic agricultural business committed to providing high-quality farm products to our customers. We are looking for a talented Social Media Manager to join our team and help us expand our online presence.


Responsibilities


	Create engaging content for social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter.
	Capture photos and videos at the farm to showcase our activities and products.
	Edit content to ensure it is visually appealing and aligns with our brand.
	Manage and schedule posts to ensure consistent online activity.
	Utilize graphic design tools like Canva to create eye-catching images.
	Implement paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Facebook Ads and Google Ads.
	Monitor and analyze engagement metrics to optimize content and strategies.


Requirements


	Minimum of 2 years of experience in social media management.
	Proven track record of increasing engagement and followers.
	Proficiency in graphic design tools like Canva.
	Experience with paid advertising on social media platforms.
	Strong communication and organizational skills.


Salary
N40,000 - N50,000 / month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and Portfolio to: realezekiel1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
